text: Okay, so as per the structure of our learning and compartmentalizing the various sections, what we're focusing on now is that blue section, the spoofing and flipping. We will be looking at various different trading strategies from false offer blocks to existing large positions, liquidity hunting to the loan ranger and false bid blocks. So these are all terms that we've coined here at Axia Futures and we'll be looking the module and then again as per usual which is so fundamentally important in your development as a price ladder trader is understanding the optimal market environment for spoofing and flipping and what did that look like and therefore how you're going to trade around that when you do observe those patterns in the marketplace and this is critically important for all the various sections of price ladder patterns.
